name: VIOLET (Tourbe, fae.exe)
description:
🌷 Willkommen bei Violett ! 🌷
🌷 Bienvenue chez Violette ! 🌷
🌷 Welcome to Violet's home ! 🌷

In Violet, you play as Violet's monster and you pay her a visit.

If you're into old-school mirror-in-the-bathroom screamers, beware; for in our game, YOU become Violet's jumpscare.

Sneak in, build up, and most importantly : don't get caught. 🤫

💗 scaring is caring 💗

Crafted with love in 48 hours for ARTE's 2nd Game Jam in MONTREUIL CITY, FRANCE (93). The jam's theme is "Mirror".

Controls

Click with your mouse and hold to roam around. It's easy as that !

Accessibility

The game requires no language knowledge at all and use a single button. It is entirely playable with one hand.

🦝 The "Raccoon & the Gang" Game Team 🦝

Game Design & Programmation : Fae.exe & Lina "Brundle_42" Abssi 🐦 📸
Game Art : Rémi "Kreaki" Décorne 🐦 📸
Sound Design : Katelyn "Musikatelyn" Isaacson
Narrative / Level Design & Itch.io page : Eve "Tourbe" Ben-Haïm 🐦
Team Mentor & Snacks Manager : Thomas "MrHelmut" Altenburger

Spécial Thanks

Arte's organisation teams, Julian KWAK, Guillaume, Anna & Louise, Ugo, Charly & le Kop, Nagui, la ✨Graphia ✨, & all of our friends and families !

Let us know your thoughts ! 💌 We'd love to hear from you.
